cards.rules_text: Whenever an opponent draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, Cos Teilo, Heir to Ulaith deals 1 damage to that player and you create a Treasure token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“If it is by force of arms that the wealthy have enriched themselves, it is by force of arms that they be dispossessed.”[/i]

cards.special_text:
[+2]: Create a black Saga enchantment token with “r{3}—You draw a card and you lose 1 life.”
[-2]: You may sacrifice a creature or enchantment. If you do, destroy target nonland permanent.
[-3]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature or enchantment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.”

cards.rules_text: Whenever an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land enters the battlefield, you may have Cos Teilo's Feast become a copy of that permanent until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]No man becomes High King without living through more stories than can be told over a single meal.[/i]

cards.card_name: To Die on a Lonely Shore
cards.rules_text: Whenever a creature you control attacks or blocks alone, it gains double strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Before you ride out to seek vengeance, my son, dig a grave deep enough to bury your pride in.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Geas 3 [i](If you cast this for an additional 3, it enters with three +1/+1 counters. Whenever this attacks unblocked, if it has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put one on it.)[/i]
As long as Mother of Crows has at least three counters on it, it has double strike and ward {2}.
{T}: Add {C}. You can't spend this mana to cast a creature spell.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The one story Cos Teilo never shares himself is that of the death of his uncle and predecessor, Mac Léd, whispered to have been pulled to an ignominious end by the water folk.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you scribe 4, Birchbark Visitor gains flying until end of turn. [i](You scribe 4 as you spend your fourth total mana to cast spells or activate abilities during a turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Short-lived and ephemeral, the birch tree has long been a symbol of Rigann and of the land of Tír Tharlar.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Ambitious Athlete enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
When Ambitious Athlete dies, return it to the battlefield transformed.
cards.special_text2:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after II.)[/i]
Look at the top three cards of your library. Exile one of them and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

cards.rules_text:
Menace [i](This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)[/i]
Geas 2 [i](If you cast this for an additional 2, it enters with two +1/+1 counters. Whenever this attacks unblocked, if it has fewer than two +1/+1 counters on it, put one on it.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The rugged coastline of An-Drim breeds a hardy, salty raiding folk.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature or enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Tragic Geas-Breaker.
When Tragic Geas-Breaker dies, return it to the battlefield transformed.
cards.special_text2: [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after II.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature or enchantment card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The mind is lost when it is ruled not just by fear, but the fear of fear.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Death's Promise deals 2 damage to any target. If a permanent you don't control dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
cards.flavor_text:

flv[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace, haste
Whenever Heir to Usraigh attacks, if there are three or more counters on creatures you control, it becomes a 4/4 Human Wolf until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It is people that make a nation, and my people have gone nowhere.”[/i]

cards.card_name: All That Was No Longer Is
cards.rules_text: Damage can't be prevented this turn. All That Was No Longer Is deals 4 damage to any target.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Even a full heart has room for grief.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Defender of the Hearth dies, return it to the battlefield transformed.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“You carved our names where the apples grow
For you and I alone to know.”
—[/i]An Áit a Raibh Ár dTeach[i][/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you touch the Otherworld, Lone Seanchaí gets +1/+1 until end of turn. [i](You touch the Otherworld when a Spirit, enchantment, or token enters the battlefield under your control.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The world was old before the king was young.”
—Tur Aun aphorism[/i]

cards.rules_text: Mill three cards, then you may return up to two creature and/or land cards from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Ancient beyond recall, the earth of Ulaith is deep and rich with secrets.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a permanent with mana value 3 or less.
Destroy target nonland permanent.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Are you gone like the snows of last winter?
What burns where your flame used to be?”
—[/i]One for Sorrow[i][/i]

cards.rules_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Then if you've touched the Otherworld this turn, create a token that's a copy of that permanent. [i](You've touched the Otherworld if a Spirit, enchantment, or token entered the battlefield under your control.)[/i]
When Dún Wanderer dies, return it to the battlefield transformed.

cards.rules_text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor_text:

—Cos Teilo[/i]

[-2]: You may sacrifice a creature or enchantment. If you do, destroy target nonland permanent.

cards.rules_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

—Cos Teilo[/i]

cards.rules_text:
